titleStmt.title: An examination of the arguments drawn from Scripture and reason, in Dr. Sherlock's Case of allegiance, and his Vindication of it
titleStmt.author: Downes, Theophilus, d. 1726.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Theophilus Downes. cf. NUC pre-1956, BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
